history.content:
While it is likely that 168 will be offered in fall, those assignments have not yet been made.   As soon as such decisions are made and confirmed, the department will post them publicly as the draft schedule of classes (see http://www.eecs.berkeley.edu/Scheduling/CS/schedule-draft.html and http://www.eecs.berkeley.edu/Scheduling/EE/schedule-draft.html ) which will then read 2016-2017 Draft Schedule as opposed to 2015-2016 draft schedule as it does now.

This will likely happen in January but not for certain until around spring break.

Is CS 168 likely to be offered in Fall 2016?

I'm asking because I was interested in the Systems aspect of Computer Networks and want to take CS 168. Ideally I would take it next semester. However, since it isn't being offered for some reason, I'm trying to decide whether to wait until the next time it's offered, or whether I should just take EE 122 (which is also about computer networks, but not the side I'm particularly interested in). If CS 168 is going to be offered again next fall, I might just wait. But if that's unlikely, it might consider taking EE 122 next semester.
history.subject: When will CS 168 be offered next?
